name: Broadway Breakdown 2
description:
Broadway Breakdown 2 - The Second Game Where You're In A Play- Kinda!

The second game in the "beloved" series, here's the Scratch description:

Welcome to Broadway Breakdown 2!!!
--(STORY)--
You play as the son of the original guy (his name is Steve now), Jerry. You are trapped inside a play as well, but this time you know it. So you have to go to the director Tom (thanks @Parykeet for that name, he's a part of LIM Industires) and... "talk out your problems" in a couple of spaceships because I can't code boss battles.

--(CONTROLS)--
Arrow keys to move. Just like the original! But now, press Z to jump and use X to dash, Don't worry, WASD controls coming soon!

--(WORLD GUIDE)--
W0: Tutorial
W1: Plains
W2: Cave
W3: Desert
W4: Factory
W5: Sky
W6: Ice
W7: Time Machine
W8: Rainbow
W9: Space
W10: Backstage
W11: Onstage
W12: Boss

--(CREDITS INGAME)--
